website_summaries.verdict: The HTC Re's features might not be as unusual as its design, but it's still a solid little camera that's easier and faster to shoot with than your average smartphone.
pros: The HTC Re is a small, simple point-and-shoot video camera that's ready to shoot when you pick it up
It's waterproof to 1 meter without a housing, and its built-in wireless and the Re app let you see what you're shooting as well as view and download what you've captured to your mobile device
cons: Its video and photo quality aren't significantly better than a smartphone and audio quality is poor
Its battery isn't user replaceable or removable
Its shape is great for holding, but the body is a bit slippery

customer_reviews.title: great for spontaneous moments
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. as a parent it's hard to be able to capture a lot of crazy moments of the kids especially that my hands are usually busy with them. this camera makes it easy for me to campture a lot of moments that would other wise be lost. I let my kids play around with them and make video diaries. the quality is decent. it does not replace professional cameras, but it's a geat cam to have. also it's not waterproof be careful. I damaged one after using it underwater. I still reordered it because it's awsome
customer_reviews.author: Israa

customer_reviews.title: COME TO FIND OUT PRODUCT WAS NOT NEW AND WAS BROKEN IN 3 MONTHS. BUYER BEWARE*********
customer_reviews.text: I was weary of the condition the product arrived in as the bottom didn't seem fully attached. I pushed it and it snapped in and seemed fine. 3 months later, I started having issues with the camera not taking pictures, freezing up, turning on record and not being able to stop it. I have performed countless hard resets, called HTC and now just got rejected for a warranty claim because they said the item wasn't new when I got it. I contacted HTC in November, which puts my purchase at 5 months old. HTC will not warrant the product and I am stuck with a paperweight. I will never purchase from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Camera With Many Flaws.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for about 4 years. They are NOT Waterproof! Am I the only one that has had problems? Another major glitch for anyone buying one is the app. I can't sem to find it an longer in the store. Luckily I was able to transfer it to my new phone from old phone . The camera will still work but it's so much more usefull with the phone app. The wide angle pix are great but no viewfinder seems to be a problem for people. This is a fun cheap secondary/ tertiary camera to spice up your IG feed.
customer_reviews.author: Buffhotwing

customer_reviews.title: Poor camera quality and mechanical design
customer_reviews.text: Initially the ergonomics and ease of use were nice. However, don't buy this device if you want to consider this as a durable item: it is not. After 6 months of occasional use, and without dropping the camera, the battery fails to hold a charge and the case has cracked along the barrel near the lanyard end as others have reported. The battery is a show stopper for continued usage and there is not a method to replace the battery. After my career in plastics, the camera body is clearly a design fault.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne P.

customer_reviews.title: dead upon second use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera October 2017 for a vacation in Hawaii. I used it the entire time. great pictures and video. I even imported into iMovie. easy to use, I loved it. brought the RE to Hawaii trip March 2018. charged it up. then nothing. tried to reboot, called customer service. no help. RE company does not offer repairs nor do they warranty their product. come on, it is only a few months old! note: I followed all recommendations re care. I even bought the extra protection accessories to keep port dry. stay away from companies that do not back up their products!
customer_reviews.author: NoName

customer_reviews.title: Not intuitive
customer_reviews.text: Not overly easy to connect to phone. Not overly easy to download photos using app on phone. If you don’t use it too often you can easily forget how to switch from photo to video modes and back. YouTube videos explaining use are few and not helpful. Company website with no instructions for troubleshooting. If you buy this use it a lot right away before loosing the packaging, because once it’s gone, you are stuck with a plastic thing that only makes noises.
customer_reviews.author: James D Tollman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect action camera for the cost.
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect action camera. we took it to Disney and I was able to get video and pics without having to carry around a larger camera. The ultra wide angle lets you get amazing shot with out the need of a view finder. My only complaint is cracks start to form around the base, this seems to be a known issue with HTC. For the cost compared to other "action" cameras i can over look the flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Floyd

customer_reviews.title: great in the hand
customer_reviews.text: Takes very clear wide angle 16mp pictures as well as video and slow-motion video. You just need to listen for the clicks and get used towhead needs to be pressed to obtain what picture recording you need. Great for underwater hangs from wrist easily so can be gotten to quickly, wish battery life was longer but that's it!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. P. Penman

customer_reviews.title: Many problems, battery ran out fast, I sent ...
customer_reviews.text: Many problems, battery ran out fast, I sent back, after a month no response, email again then came back with the same unit in addition of two crack lines, the major issue is that the software is very difficult to connect using wifi, without your iphone screen, it is also very difficult to know what kind of pictures you are taking.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Lee

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper and easier than gopro. Perfect for water sports when you dont want to get your phone wet.
customer_reviews.text: Compact and water proof. This is the second one I purchased as a gift for my father when we go on vacation. Its great around the pool and lazy river. Many many great vacation photos from this camera. Easily transfers photos from here to your phone using ap and wifi. Or you can use a card reader to a laptop. Much better price point than gopro.
customer_reviews.author: Amazn junki

customer_reviews.title: Love it !
customer_reviews.text: I love that camera ! I got one as a present last year and its awesome! I m taking it snowboarding, kayaking, swimming , to the beach etc. It records in good quality and is easy to use. I love the slow motion option for video :)The only thing I didn't like is that when the battery is low and you are in the sun its hard to tell if you re recording or not cause you cant hear the click or see the little light. But even though I still love it. Already bough it for my 2 other friends,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wish they would come out with a 2nd version
customer_reviews.text: Awesome camera love how easy and quick it takes a picture I love the app that connects to my phone sad that the plastic has a problem on the bottom eventually I think that's mostly due to overheating if you try and take it on a plane because you can't shut the unit off all the way still bought a second one to replace my first one my first ones still working just has some cracks in the bottom
customer_reviews.author: ben waters

customer_reviews.title: The packaging really makes the product look cool but the design of the packaging exacerbates stress rather ...
customer_reviews.text: It arrived with it's base cracked off. It must have received an impact it shipping. The packaging really makes the product look cool but the design of the packaging exacerbates stress rather than protecting against it. I've ordered another one but I'm going to put duct tape on it first thing (if it isn't DOA). A little thicker plastic and sounds like it would be really neat. Keeping my fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: Don3484

customer_reviews.title: Great to catch a quick picture while on the go.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on the bicycle since I only have to aim and shoot. No logging on to a phone or turning on a camera as it is ready to go as soon as you take it in your hand. Been able to get more pictures and videos because of that. Videos do need to be short, especially if you are riding on a bumpy surface as the picture "bumps" too. Haven't tried slow motion yet.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Great lil cam !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom for Mother's Day. She rides a motorcycle and takes a lot of action shots. Has a great go pro but says it's way to complicated while riding etc . She absolutely loves this little camera ! It can connect straight to your phone and will immediately upload to your gallery! I will be buying one for myself as well !!!
customer_reviews.author: Cer Vee

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and low quality. Good for taking quick snap shots.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and it shows it. The case is cracked on arrival. Battery life is okay. I did have any connectivity issue, but it does require two tries every time. The picture quality is not bad in good lighting conditions, but the angle is too wide. It would be better if the lens is less fisheyes. Excellent form factor for taking pictures when cycling. That’s about the only thing it’s good for.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Tung

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly suprised. I would rather use this than my phone.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't know what to expect, but I actually really like it. Takes great pictures and videos if the lighting is good. There do seem to be blury ones on occasion if the objects are moving quickly and the low light is just OK. The microphone is also not the best, but it works. I got this for anytime I want to grab a few pics of my daughters playing or doing activities. If I want professional pictures taken, I will pay someone, but this is great for just quick pics and videos.
customer_reviews.author: steven smith

customer_reviews.title: Point and shoot, good price and I can record stuff and talk on my phone at the same time!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Easy to hold in your hand and fits perfectly in my pocket. With how quick you can turn it on and it not being my phone, I'm capturing moments I would normally have missed. The video quality is great and the wide lens helps me to just point and shoot. I don't have to look at any screen to see if I've got it framed right so its just easy to use. Cons: You have to remove the bottom plug to pop out the SD card and if you have large fingers you might have trouble getting it out. I have small fingers so its pretty easy to get the SD card out.
customer_reviews.author: john der

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your Buck - Go with the RE
customer_reviews.text: For the price point and for what I purchased this camera for, it's perfect. May family used it for all water sports (Ocean, Pool, Parasailing, etc.) during spring break in Mexico (buy the optional immersion kit). Videos are smooth with no artifacts, stills are fine and the time lapse (did several sunrises) feature is awesome. The RE app for Android (Galaxy S6) can be frustrating, but it does work. All in all a great purchase and it shipped on time and complete.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool little camera at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: A really cool little camera at a fantastic price here on Amazon. I purchased it primarily to video my group bike rides and take pictures. Wide angle feature is really cool. I found a nice handlebar light mount by Lezyne that holds the re perfectly. Only issue obviously is that it doesn't have a flash, so your relegated to daytime activities. Also, a closeup shot requires you to hold the camera REALLY close to the object.
customer_reviews.author: Alvin Marin

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: This camera works great! I took it on my trip to Hawaii and all my pictures turned out beautiful. I even got pictures/video of a sea turtle! The resolution isn't like a professional camera but for $50 you really can't beat the functionality.
customer_reviews.author: jchem

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended - very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Received the RE Camera fairly quickly. Charged the camera for first use and linked it with the RE App. Tested that the camera was working. Attempted to use the camera while snorkeling in the ocean on my vacation. I had the camera on my wrist using the supplied strap. Went to take a picture and all that was left was the bottom part of the camera. The bottom white part of the camera (where the usb port and SD card slot are) , the strap and the plastic screw for attaching the strap was all that I had left. The camera apparently fell apart in the water. Not recommended - very poor quality. Would give it zero stars.
customer_reviews.author: JChan

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: It is very cool. I wish it had a better on / off button to conserve the battery, but I knew what it was before I bought it, so if lives up to my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: ComputRFixer

customer_reviews.title: Not all Camera are from the US and Warranty may not be used in the US
customer_reviews.text: Careful when purchasing the camera. Some of the cameras come from Australia and if you are from US and need repairs under warranty, you might have to send it to Australia. and you cover your own shipping......
customer_reviews.author: J. Ng

customer_reviews.title: this camera takes the most beautiful pictures in and out of the water
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could purchased 10 more. This Camera is worth every penny!!! Brought it because a go pro is a bit on the expensive side and I wanted something reasonable. Trust me when I tell you this, this camera takes the most beautiful pictures in and out of the water. LOVE, LOVE, LOVE it! Thanks HTC, you made my pockets and my heart happy :-)
customer_reviews.author: Jae Yette

customer_reviews.title: Cool little camera.
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera that rivals the GoPro. Look, it's not a GoPro, but it's much more user friendly and not as conspicuous as a GoPro since everyone knows what a GP looks like now. This little thing looks like an inhaler, which is fine. It sits easily on a flat surface and it's super easy to use. Connecting with the app is easy and it's fun to play around with. If you cannot afford a GoPro, get this, you'll be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Jacobsen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I wanted it. Hiking, trail running.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little camera. I use it to take pictures during my hikes, trail runs and it’s perfect. Gave it four star only because it lacks focus in low light situations.
customer_reviews.author: Rey

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I use it for my vlog. Microphone works good and camera is good quality as long as the lighting is bright, not so good in dark or dim light.
customer_reviews.author: Dbsylvia

customer_reviews.title: a useless thing
customer_reviews.text: I think the HTC RE is not good as I thought. Since it just a camera and phone can work as this. It is useless
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Slow motion and time lapse option are great options that add a fun factor to the product ...
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use and fast, the lens wide angle allows you to shot videos and photos without need of a display screen. Fits in my pocket and it has replaced my phone camera. Slow motion and time lapse option are great options that add a fun factor to the product It came with the bottom cap broken and without the charger, the product works fine but it is not brand new.
customer_reviews.author: papafrita

customer_reviews.title: I was NOT satisfied and NOT happy with this 2nd purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd HTC RE purchase in 2 weeks. I was very satisfied and happy with the first purchase. However, this 2nd purchase of the same kind of HTC RE was very disappointing as I got a lemon and broken unit. It will not turn on even if the battery light is green and really is not inoperable and a broken unit. I am returning for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Magno

customer_reviews.title: Stress cracks with the first month
customer_reviews.text: Pictures are blurry, but worst of all is that it's been only a month and there are stress fractures at the base of the camera while it was in my backpack. The same thing happened to a friend of mine who had it first. This looses its waterproof option.
customer_reviews.author: kemfizix

customer_reviews.title: Keep this thing in your pocket.
customer_reviews.text: I've had several of these and love the point and shoot aspect of this camera. It doesn't need a lens finder because with the ultra wide angle, everything will be in the frame. I'm sad HTC stopped making these.
customer_reviews.author: Rod Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: The housing was cracked on arrival but that didn't effect its performance. Works well for the price. Links to my galaxy note 8 and photos & video once uploaded to phone have good quality. Night photos and videos not soo much. Great in the daylight.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: I have to say that i am pretty sad aboutt my RE cam
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that i am pretty sad aboutt my RE cam, I just loved it, i got great pictures and now it do not turn on. It has a blue light and it seems it's broken. I give to the HTC Re camera just one star because it is dead and bought mine one in January, only seven months. I want a new one, but a good one. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: VE735691

customer_reviews.title: Cracked
customer_reviews.text: Bummer showed up cracked (see pic) similar to other reviewers stated. Probably going to return not exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Chris McK

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with current iOS update (iOS 13)
customer_reviews.text: This is camera useless until syncing issue with iOS13 is resolved. No response from HTC
customer_reviews.author: Gary L

customer_reviews.title: For when you don't want to use your phone..
customer_reviews.text: Works well enough, but photos can be grainy since you can't specifically focus the camera or change the scoping. The app works, but at that point I'd just use my phone. this was purchased for ease of use and the fact that I can take it with my and don't have to take out my phone. Strapped it to my bike for offroading and it did better than my cousin's GoPro for stability.
customer_reviews.author: John N.

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Useless. Why should I buy this camera at first place.
customer_reviews.author: zhang lu

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS CAMERA! It's perfect for setting up to record a group activity and perfect for on the go. I wish Amazon would sell the accesories for it, but I love it none the less
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery life??
customer_reviews.text: Experiencing short battery life. Only one hour operation and only a few pictures after an 8 hour charge. May have a defective unit? Does not nearly match battery life noted in other reviews?
customer_reviews.author: John E Horr

customer_reviews.title: Broken product
customer_reviews.text: The seller shipped me used product with broken bottom. The bottom was supposed to screw onto the Re Cam for waterproof purpose but the seller borke it and re-sold to me. Very disappointed and upset. The product was used and had 4 videos recorded in the memory card.
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use on the fly!
customer_reviews.text: I love these odd ball cameras. Second one as I was brutal to the first one. Great all around action/vaca cam.
customer_reviews.author: Al S.

customer_reviews.title: Does not connect with your phone as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: It will not connect with my iPhone as advertised. So, it is merely a portable camera that you have to plug into your computer to download the photos....that is, when it works. Basically, save your money and do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Tinney

customer_reviews.title: Does not ever work for the first time
customer_reviews.text: Finally brought it for a beach vacation. Got it out and it would not even charge! Waiting for seller to reach out either for a refund or send a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: N. Lim

customer_reviews.title: It's not easy to use as there is no view finder so ...
customer_reviews.text: It's not easy to use as there is no view finder so you're not really sure what you're shooting and it's very far away and you have to do manipulation on the photo to get a good print before you can post or use the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Shouldice

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy fun but Waterproof case mounting 2 hours Battery time , Not mounted during charging
customer_reviews.author: SE PYOUNG OH

customer_reviews.title: Had to send one back to HTC due to water ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to send one back to HTC due to water getting into the unit. Will be trying it in water again soon, as that is one reason I got this. However they replaced without issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera
customer_reviews.text: Good camera, bought it for my daughter to use, not the best picture kind of a wide angle, but it is cool. Also can download a free app and connect the camera to your phone via bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Completely disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera which was already damaged at the bottom. It worked for a couple of minutes where it showed the orange indicator & then stopped working completely. Unfortunately I cannot do anything about it as I've got the product in India & cannot send it back. Totally regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Pritish Sangharajka

customer_reviews.title: Leaked first time used..
customer_reviews.text: I am not a happy purchaser of this item the first time we used it in the water as a test...it leaked..and because it was a gift ..and we didn't use it within the 30 day window they don't want to take it back or replace it...
customer_reviews.author: James B. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Takes great pictures and videos but it stopped working after a ...
customer_reviews.text: Takes great pictures and videos but it stopped working after a month The warranty replacement died in a week. Waiting on customer service for another replacement. Too bad fun idea. We want this to work
customer_reviews.author: Your Bacon my hart

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend this.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if this camera is a refurbished or new. It would not let me connect to it with my phone and there was zero technical support available. I do not recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Dockery

customer_reviews.title: It did the intended job!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Easy to carry & use. Would not recommend for sporty days, better for casual tourist days. Cons: you have to stand still to get best picture quality, i wished it had a sport mode where it would get great quality (no blurriness) while moving.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor instructions
customer_reviews.text: Still trying to figure it out. If you aren't techy, the simple instructions to go to Google play isn't enough. My husband bought this and gave up. I haven't had time to study and figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: addicted2books

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth it
customer_reviews.text: Amazing little camera! It was perfect for our cruise vacation. Cheap but well worth it, great camera video and great pictures. Easy to hook up to a smart phone to check out all the pictures. Used to for a zip line tour and was so happy with how it came out!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, well made, seems to be working as intended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kazoo

customer_reviews.title: Great pictures, not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I am so upset with this product. Although it takes wonderful pictures the base of it has cracked after light summer use.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor hall

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got it used/cheap
customer_reviews.text: case is plastic and it cracked from gripping it strongly. Once that happened it was no longer waterproof and now its dead. Glad I got it used/cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Zack K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: best camera around as far as discreet size and quality
customer_reviews.author: caseyboy

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: What I've tried so far seems like a good camera it has good picture and video quality the only thing is sometimes pictures come out of focus even in regular light, the connection to iphone is slow and I always have to go back to select the proper wifi to connect, it doesn't do it automatically
customer_reviews.author: Pepe Marcos

customer_reviews.title: It's super light weight and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Me and my finance bought this camera for our winter trip to Santa Fe. It's super light weight and easy to use. I hand held my RE to a marathon race and I took lots and lots beautiful pictures. I didn't feel anything while I held my RE. It's the best purchase ever. My RE is just over 1 year old and I would purchase again if I need to.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: ... this camera since my brother had ordered one and liked it. Only problem is that the waterproof camera ...
customer_reviews.text: Was really excited to order this camera since my brother had ordered one and liked it. Only problem is that the waterproof camera that was sent was defective (a crack in the bottom near the base which would render it not waterproof. I had hesitated to order since there were comments made about the fact that there were cracks in the camera when people received them, and that folks had to wait for a replacement camera. Hopefully, the next one I receive will not be defective upon opening it. I never got to use it, since I discovered the flaw. I'm wondering if this a design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Goble

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product!
customer_reviews.text: Utterly disappointed. Camera came with a crack! Not visual damage to courier box or the box that store the camera. But there’s a crack at the camera (see photo). I just bought a damaged product.
customer_reviews.author: Seow keong

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: product is great for outdoors. no hassle in taking pictures: just click, click, click! also the wide angle is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: jema

customer_reviews.title: Small and handy
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and enjoy while traveling. Would love a wireless connection to download quicker
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Like the password protected feature but once the camera is ...
customer_reviews.text: the camera gets hot after using it for a while, not sure if there is a problem with this unit or that is the case for all unit. Like the password protected feature but once the camera is connected to the phone, the phone can see all the photos stored in the camera even though it is disconnected.
customer_reviews.author: Wee Yee Ng

customer_reviews.title: Good wide angle camera but definitely not for under water ...
customer_reviews.text: Broken after submerging it in water. Called customer service and got a replacement. Good wide angle camera but definitely not for under water usage.
customer_reviews.author: ZJ Poh

customer_reviews.title: Product Quality & Working Condition
customer_reviews.text: Camera working fine. Not able to preview unless bluetooth connect to mobile
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Very simple and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I liked this camera very much. It's small, simple and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Zaiden Santos

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes has trouble reading micro sd card and recognizing cell phones. Overall a decent camera for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great unique camera with good sharpness.
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera. Rather insconpicous and always ready to shoot
customer_reviews.author: J. Rottman

customer_reviews.title: I like the stabiliy of the pic.
customer_reviews.text: Its very nice camera. I like its shape and stability of the picture. I took pic. When im skating and still good and clear pic.
customer_reviews.author: Tareq Mohammed

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this RE, very awesome and at such a great price. The only thing is that it was damaged during shipping and the bottom piece broke in two, so I cannot use the strap. Other than that, it was a great buy. Great pictures, great video, discreet and waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: michael demary

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LITTLE CAMERA!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little camera. V discreet. The quality for both stills and movies is excellent. If you want it to be completely water resistant, you will have to buy one the accessories which I I would recommend you do. Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Poor material selection or process control.
customer_reviews.text: I love the camera, but the materials that it is made out of don't even stand the shipping. The cracks prove to make this a non-waterproof camera. I got two cameras and both had these cracks from shipping.
customer_reviews.author: College for life

customer_reviews.title: Mine was not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: It is an OK camera but not waterproof by any means. Dead, dead, dead after one exposure to water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i love
customer_reviews.text: Water proofed, and the battery last very long time. i love it
customer_reviews.author: tomR

customer_reviews.title: other than that it looks and functions fine.
customer_reviews.text: there is a little crack on the bottle of the RE, other than that it looks and functions fine.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Fragile base
customer_reviews.text: The camera and features are great, but the base cracked within 1 week. I only used this product a couple of times.
customer_reviews.author: Stevenshep

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this device
customer_reviews.text: The worst product from HTC so far. Material is so cheap. It's cometely broke while opening the original box! I don't suggest it at all and so sorry for HTC brand for such disappoinment.
customer_reviews.author: ashk_atash

customer_reviews.title: It was broken when I received it. I returned ...
customer_reviews.text: It was broken when I received it. I returned it at the end. I ended up getting a go pro.
customer_reviews.author: P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great summer fun in the pool taking photos and videos.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: takes amazing quick pictures. pretty awesome go pro cheap alternative.

customer_reviews.title: really bad customer support, no response
customer_reviews.text: sent an email to vendor more than 2 weeks ago and no response, so here it goes, the device body just above the bottom cap has cracked out and is wide open to the elements. The white plastic seems to be very thin and there is a seal behind it and i have not dropped the device or anything to cause it to crack, i have included a pic, also i got a new android phone v30 and the camera app will not connect to the camera no matter what i do. So beware for android 7.0 phones it will not connect. It will still connect to my older phones and tablets.
customer_reviews.author: T. Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Love everything about it!
customer_reviews.text: This was such a great buy! Awesome photo and video quality. Takes a little time to learn all the ins and outs of how it operates, but this little guy is my new favorite. And the waterproof feature works like a charm!!

customer_reviews.title: I love the idea of this and really with they make ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of this and really with they make a newer, improved version. This is the digital alternative to a disposable camera. It's extremely durable, can be synced so many ways, is easy to use, etc. The battery doesn't last very long though since you can't turn it off without using a phone. I bought it so I can take pictures without my phone, so I had to recharge it after maybe 5 or 8 hours of pictures. Beat my expectations & takes great pictures with incredible resolution. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: The picture and video quality is good enough for your run-of-the-mill stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the more "fun" gadgets. The picture and video quality is good enough for your run-of-the-mill stuff, but not a Go-Pro substitute. I love the discreet design and turn on by grip function, not a lot of complexity, very user friendly. Not having a screen to see what your photos would come out like took a little getting use to, but the wide screen shot captures pretty much everything in the aimed direction, just takes a little editing after the fact.
customer_reviews.author: Claudzee

customer_reviews.title: A complete waste of money
customer_reviews.text: If there was a negative review rating it would be a -5. The manual does not cover any of the required information in the least. There is no information on how to change the date and time setting. The battery is the weakest I have ever seen. It last about 2 30 second recordings if not wired directly to a computer. The record button is next to impossible to tell when it is recording or not. I had thought about using this as a dashcam but I see it would not be of any use as that. My recommendation, don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

product_meta.title: HTC RE 16.0MP Waterproof Digital Camera (White)
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteRE lets you focus on the moment, not on your camera. Remarkably fun, incredibly easy: one-handed use brings you out from behind a screen and back into the moment. Grip sensor turns it on when you pick it up, and a single button takes photos with a tap and videos with a press. Wide-angle lens replaces the need for a viewfinder, and waterproof construction replaces the need for a case.
feature_bullets: Ultra-Wide Angle Lens No need for a viewfinder. 146 degree ultra-wide view captures everything.
Grip Sensor No fumbling with the on/off switch. An automatic sensor detects your grip for instant-on use.
One-Button Control Tap for photos, press for videos. Seamless control eliminates the need for a photo/video mode switch.
Ergonomic Design Subtle size and form-fitting grip fits your hand naturally for distraction-free use.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars335 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
